name: template_sample_rows_two_cols
sql: SELECT SUBJECT_ID, HADM_ID FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 100

name: template_count_rows_sampled
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE ROWNUM <= 1000

name: template_distinct_sample
sql: SELECT DISTINCT SUBJECT_ID FROM ADMISSIONS WHERE SUBJECT_ID IS NOT NULL AND ROWNUM <= 50
